00014 #ifndef CHARINTERFACE_H_
00015 #define CHARINTERFACE_H_

00019 class XPort;
00020 //#include <stdarg.h>
00021 
00022 //! Standard interface for character devices. e.g. GPIB, serial port, ....
00023 class XCharInterface : public XInterface
00024 {
00025     XNODE_OBJECT
00026 protected:
00027     XCharInterface(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver);
00028 public:
00029     virtual ~XCharInterface() {}
00030    
00031     //! Buffer is Thread-Local-Strage.
00032     //! Therefore, be careful when you access multi-interfaces in one thread.
00033     //! \sa XThreadLocal
00034     const std::vector<char> &buffer() const;
00035     //! error-check is user's responsibility.
00036     int scanf(const char *format, ...) const
00037         __attribute__ ((format(scanf,2,3)));
00038     double toDouble() const throw (XConvError &);
00039     int toInt() const throw (XConvError &);
00040     unsigned int toUInt() const throw (XConvError &);
00041   
00042     void send(const XString &str) throw (XCommError &);
00043     virtual void send(const char *str) throw (XCommError &);
00044     //! format version of send()
00045     //! \sa printf()
00046     void sendf(const char *format, ...) throw (XInterfaceError &)
00047         __attribute__ ((format(printf,2,3)));
00048     virtual void write(const char *sendbuf, int size) throw (XCommError &);
00049     virtual void receive() throw (XCommError &);
00050     virtual void receive(unsigned int length) throw (XCommError &);
00051     void query(const XString &str) throw (XCommError &);
00052     virtual void query(const char *str) throw (XCommError &);
00053     //! format version of query()
00054     //! \sa printf()
00055     void queryf(const char *format, ...) throw (XInterfaceError &)
00056         __attribute__ ((format(printf,2,3)));
00057   
00058     void setEOS(const char *str);
00059     void setGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite(bool x) {m_bGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite = x;}
00060     void setGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead(bool x) {m_bGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead = x;}
00061     void setGPIBWaitBeforeWrite(int msec) {m_gpibWaitBeforeWrite = msec;}
00062     void setGPIBWaitBeforeRead(int msec) {m_gpibWaitBeforeRead = msec;}
00063     void setGPIBWaitBeforeSPoll(int msec) {m_gpibWaitBeforeSPoll = msec;}
00064     void setGPIBMAVbit(unsigned char x) {m_gpibMAVbit = x;}
00065   
00066     const XString &eos() const {return m_eos;}
00067     bool gpibUseSerialPollOnWrite() const {return m_bGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite;}
00068     bool gpibUseSerialPollOnRead() const {return m_bGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead;}
00069     int gpibWaitBeforeWrite() const {return m_gpibWaitBeforeWrite;}
00070     int gpibWaitBeforeRead() const {return m_gpibWaitBeforeRead;}
00071     int gpibWaitBeforeSPoll() const {return m_gpibWaitBeforeSPoll;}
00072     unsigned char gpibMAVbit() const {return m_gpibMAVbit;}
00073     
00074     void setSerialBaudRate(unsigned int rate) {m_serialBaudRate = rate;}
00075     void setSerialStopBits(unsigned int bits) {m_serialStopBits = bits;}
00076   
00077     unsigned int serialBaudRate() const {return m_serialBaudRate;}
00078     unsigned int serialStopBits() const {return m_serialStopBits;}
00079 
00080     virtual bool isOpened() const {return m_xport;}
00081 protected:
00082     virtual void open() throw (XInterfaceError &);
00083     //! This can be called even if has already closed.
00084     virtual void close() throw (XInterfaceError &);
00085 private:
00086     XString m_eos;
00087     bool m_bGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite;
00088     bool m_bGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead;
00089     int m_gpibWaitBeforeWrite;
00090     int m_gpibWaitBeforeRead;
00091     int m_gpibWaitBeforeSPoll;
00092     unsigned char m_gpibMAVbit; //! don't check if zero
00093   
00094     unsigned int m_serialBaudRate;
00095     unsigned int m_serialStopBits;
00096     
00097     shared_ptr<XPort> m_xport;
00098 
00099     //! for scripting
00100     shared_ptr<XStringNode> m_script_send;
00101     shared_ptr<XStringNode> m_script_query;
00102     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnSendRequested;
00103     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnQueryRequested;
00104     void onSendRequested(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00105     void onQueryRequested(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00106 };
00107 
00108 class XPort {
00109 public:
00110     XPort(XCharInterface *interface);
00111     virtual ~XPort();
00112     virtual void open() throw (XInterface::XCommError &) = 0;
00113     virtual void send(const char *str) throw (XInterface::XCommError &) = 0;
00114     virtual void write(const char *sendbuf, int size) throw (XInterface::XCommError &) = 0;
00115     virtual void receive() throw (XInterface::XCommError &) = 0;
00116     virtual void receive(unsigned int length) throw (XInterface::XCommError &) = 0;
00117     //! Buffer is Thread-Local-Strage.
00118     //! Therefore, be careful when you access multi-interfaces in one thread.
00119     //! \sa XThreadLocal
00120     std::vector<char>& buffer() {return *s_tlBuffer;}
00121 protected:
00122     static XThreadLocal<std::vector<char> > s_tlBuffer;
00123     XCharInterface *const m_pInterface;
00124 };
00125 
00126 #endif /*CHARINTERFACE_H_*/
